column1: Andriel is one of the three main characters of The Lord of the Rings: War in the North. She is an Elves Lore-master from Rivendell. She is voiced by Laura Bailey.
==History==
===Life as a Lore-master===
File:The Lord of the Rings- War in the North - Concept Art of Andriel1.pngAndriel was born in Rivendell
column2: and already in her youth she was skilled in healing and Magic. Elrond taught her more about magic and lore
column3: while Elladan and Elrohir taught her about weapons and combat. While living in Rivendell she met Aragorn and Gandalf. After her training was complete she was sent many times to the wilderness of Eriador and Rhovanion by Elrond
column4: to gather information about the world. Therefore
column5: she has wandered much through the regions surrounding Rivendell. During these wanderings she has made contact with the Rangers of the North
column6: including Halbarad and Eradan (video game character).

column1: In September  she Wandering Companies Gildor to the Emyn Beraid
column3: and visit their kin in Lindon. Near Bree
column4: Andriel got a premonition that something would happen in the south. She left the company and travelled through the Andrath to Sarn Ford. There she did speak with Halbarad
column5: who did have the same feelings and had ordered his men to make barricades.

column1: File:2011-12-23 00058.jpg and Farin (video game character) overhear the conservation of the Witch-king and Agandaûr.
===War of the Ring===
When the Nazgûl attacked the guard that morning Andriel assisted the Rangers
column2: together with Eradan and Farin (video game character). They were defeated and many of the rangers were killed. Shortly after the attack the Witch-king meets with Agandaûr. Where the latter tells he had summoned the Orcs of the Misty Mountains and has assembled an army in Fornost. The Witch-king sends him back to Fornost
column3: to attack immediately.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

column1: Halbarad sent her
column4: where they have to warn Aragorn. The three companions meet him in the Prancing Pony. After they told him about the conservation
column5: he sends them immediately to Fornost to stop Agandaûr before he attacks.

column1: The three travelled to Fornost Erain
column2: where they freed a Eagles - Beleram - and met with Elladan and Elrohir
column3: who were sent by Elrond to uncover the darkness in Fornost.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column5: Main GateThe Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column8: being an acquaintance of the twins
column9: introduces her two companions and explains about their mission to stop Agandaûrs army. They team up with Beleram and the sons of Elrond to kill Agandaûr. On their way to the citadel they take seperate roads and defeat several ambushes of Orcs and Goblins.

column1: File:The Lord of the Rings War in the North - Andriel&Goblins.jpg in Fornost.At the gate - Magic protected by Agandaûr against intruders - they again join the sons of Elrond. While the twins remove the spell from the gate
column2: Andriel and her companions protect them against an attack of Orcs and a Trolls.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column4: The Citadel In the citadel tower they overhead Agandaûr and Tharzog
column5: the chieftain of the Orcs of Mount Gram
column6: who speak about intruders. While they attempt to follow Agandaûr
column7: Tharzog notices them and commands his servants to close a gate. This seperates Andriel
column8: Eradan and Farin again from Elladan and Elrohir. While the twins go onward
column9: Andriel and her companions fight and kill Tharzog and his guard.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North

column1: After the death of Tharzog the three heroes go to the top of the citadel tower
column2: where they find Agandaûr fighting the Sons of Elrond. Although Agandaûr had the upper hand in the fight
column5: Farin and the sons of Elrond at the same time and flees on the back of a Fell beast. Beleram pursues Agandaûr
column6: but the latter creates a thunderstorm above Fornost. After being hit by a lightning
column7: Beleram draws back and returns to the tower. Here
column8: Andriel and her companions speak with the Eagle about the events in Fornost. Andriel returns to Sarn Ford with Eradan and Farin
column9: while Elladan and Elrohir go back to Rivendell and Beleram returns to his Lord of the Eagles

column1: ==Skills==
Her main weapon is a staff
column2: which she uses for both melee- and ranged-combat. One of her abilities makes it possible to create a magical shield that protects her and the other members of her fellowship.http://asia.gamespot.com/?tag=header%3Blogo Gamespot Asia
